concept.title: OAuth 2 Authorization
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the HTTP Client processor to use the OAuth 2 protocol to connect to an HTTP service that uses basic, digest, or universal authentication, OAuth 2 client credentials, OAuth 2 username and password, or OAuth 2 JSON Web Tokens (JWT).

conbody.p: HTTP Client processorOAuth 2OAuth 2HTTP Client processorThe OAuth 2 protocol authorizes third-party access to HTTP service resources without sharing credentials. The HTTP Client processor uses credentials to request an access token from the service. The service returns the token to the processor, and then the processor includes the token in a header in each request to the resource URL.
